articles.title: Lower risk of Parkinson's disease associated with prostate medication - ANI News
articles.description: Iowa [US], February 5 (ANI): The recent findings of a large observational study suggest that lower risk of developing Parkinson's disease is associated with taking a particular type of medication, that is used for the treatment of enlarged prostate.

articles.title: Weekly tests, 14-day isolation most cost-effective way to control Covid spread — Lancet study - ThePrint
articles.description: Study by researchers from the US and Hong Kong is based on a multi-scale model, which looks at eight Covid-19 strategies that factor in costs of tests, hospital admission and salary loss.
